item.title: Shayan Project
item.description: Hello, your compute has virus import matplotlib.pyplot as plt xi = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7] yi = [1.86, 5.63, 12.42, 17.58, 21.15, 28.49, 33.48, 37.26] a = b = loss = dloss_a = dloss_b = 0 learning_rate = 0.001 loss_history = [] for _ in range(500): loss =dloss_a=dloss_b= 0 for i in range(len(xi)): y = a * xi[i] + b loss = loss + (yi[i] - y) ** 2 dloss_a += -2 * xi[i] * (yi[i] - y) dloss_b += -2 * (yi[i] - y) a = a - learning_rate * dloss_a b = b - learning_rate * dloss_b loss_history.
